problem_text_cn: 如图,在△ABC中,点D,E分别在边AB,AC上,DE∥BC,已知AE=6,\frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{3}{7},则EC的长是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, the points D and E are on the edges AB and AC respectively, DE ∥ BC, given that AE = N_0, \frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{N_1}{N_2}, then the length of EC is ()
raw_comment: 此题主要考查了相似三角形的判定与性质,得出\frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{AE}{AC}是解题关键．
